casebody.data:
NOONSAB
v.
STATE OF NC 131P16-12 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Somchai Noonsab, for Noonsab, Somchai. Somchoi Noorsob, for Noorsob, Somchoi. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of July 2019 by Petitioner for Order for Release:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of July 2019."
